content:
I need to identify this samples.

author: chn

comments.content:
The top one is ITC Garamond, right... is that a light weight?   
And what about the second sample?   
   
Thx.
I'm guessing [Lucida Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518125244/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/lucida/bright/charmap.html) for the bottom one.

Sorry for not linking or looking up the second sample, I had to deal with a work-related emergency.. Last minute bug fixing. ![:-(](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518125244im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/sad.gif)   
   
I agree with Eduardo, that's Lucida.

I think [Lucida Bright](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518125244/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/lucida-bright/) may be a better match.   
   
Edit: Oops, I see that's what you already linked to. I thought you meant [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518125244/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/lucida/).
